| History                 = CNCB News was a news channel that reported the appearance of a young girl that had developed superpowers. During their reports, reporter [[Richard Profit (Earth-616)|Dick Profit]], pilot [[John Warmflash (Earth-616)|John Warmflash]] and a cameraman were killed by the actions of [[Rachel Oakley (Earth-616)|Rachel Oakley]], the very girl they were reporting about.{{r|Mockingbird Vol 1 3}}
